description:
Chat with ALL AI Bots Concurrently, Discover the Best

Large Language Models (LLMs) based AI bots are amazing. However, their behavior can be random and different bots excel at different tasks. If you want the best experience, don't try them one by one. ChatALL (Chinese name: 齐叨) can send prompt to several AI bots concurrently, help you to discover the best results. All you need to do is download, install and ask.
What's Changed
- docs: update ChatGPT domain in README by @xizhengl in https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/pull/898
- Update dependencies by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/pull/907 & https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/pull/913
- Add OpenAI API gpt-4o-mini Bot by @cesaryuan in https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/pull/893
- Add flex-wrap property to FooterBar component by @cesaryuan in https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/pull/895
- Add Gemma2 9b bot via Groq Cloud API by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/pull/882
- Update domain chat.openai.com -> chatgpt.com by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/pull/914
- Restrict the max height of ChatResponse by @cesaryuan in https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/pull/894
- Fix QianWen Bot by @cesaryuan in https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/pull/892
- Remove legacy GPT-3.5 Turbo 16k via OpenAI API by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/pull/838
New Contributors
- @xizhengl made their first contribution in https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/pull/898
- @cesaryuan made their first contribution in https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/pull/893
Full Changelog: https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/compare/v1.82.107...v1.83.108
